Color Palette

Brand Colors

Cyan / Teal
#51F4EF
Used for: Hero feature headings, navigation active dot, accent highlights
Blue
#4B80EA
Used for: Spotlight section heading, team section headings, team member names
Orange
#F88015
Used for: "Our Story" section heading and dot
Purple
#A105E2
Used for: "Our Facility" section heading and dot
Gold / Yellow
#eff923
Used for: Page accents, navigation dots
Accent Blue
#007AFF
Used for: Link hover states, interactive elements

Neutral Colors

Black (Primary)
#000000
Used for: Primary text, hero content section background, team section background
Dark Gray (Secondary)
#1a1a1a
Used for: Secondary backgrounds
Gray
#2a2a2a
Used for: Backgrounds, team modal image background
Text Dark
#333333
Used for: Primary body text, paragraphs
Medium Gray
#4D4D4D
Used for: Spotlight section background
Text Light
#666666
Used for: Secondary text, captions
Beige
#ACA18F
Used for: Modal close button
Border Color
#e0e0e0
Used for: Borders, dividers
Light Background
#f5f5f5
Used for: Alternate section backgrounds
White
#ffffff
Used for: Main background, text on dark backgrounds

Spacing Scale

--spacing-xs (0.5rem)
8px
--spacing-sm (1rem)
16px
--spacing-md (2rem)
32px
--spacing-lg (3rem)
48px
--spacing-xl (4rem)
64px
--spacing-xxl (6rem)
96px

Layout

Container
Max Width: 1200px
Padding: 0 1.5rem (24px)
Transitions
Base Transition: 0.3s ease

Font Weights

UI Components

Navigation Dot (Active State)
Size: 12px × 12px
Color: #51F4EF
Position: top: -12px from link
Section Heading Dot
Size: 16px × 16px
Position: left: 0, padding-left: 2rem on heading
